title: Kim Kardashian blows kisses to fans at technology convention in Armenia after her children's baptism
text:
She recently witnessed her three younger children - Saint, three, Chicago, 20 months, and Psalm, four months, get baptised in her family's ancestral homeland.

And Kim Kardashian was back to business as she attended the World Congress on Information Technology (WCIT) convention at the Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concert Complex in Yerevan, Armenia, on Tuesday morning.

The KUWTK star, 38, blew kisses at onlookers as she prepared to discuss her beauty empire at the annual event, which is held between Sunday and Wednesday.

She means business! Kim Kardashian attended the World Congress on Information Technology convention at the Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concert Complex in Yerevan on Tuesday

Mother-of-four Kim was suited and booted as she shrouded her famous curves in a cream two-piece, featuring a longline blazer and a strapless straight-leg jumpsuit.

Maintaining her stylish display, the pop culture icon strutted across the venue in a pair of white pointed heels.

With her raven tresses styled into effortless waves, Kim complemented her beauty with brown eyeshadow, matte foundation and classic nude lipstick for the perfect pout.

The brunette beauty was in her element as she put on a playful display at the event, four years after her first visit to the country.

In her element: The KUWTK star, 38, blew kisses at onlookers as she prepared to discuss her beauty empire at the annual event, which is held between Sunday and Wednesday

She's home: The TV personality witnessed her kids Saint, three, Chicago, 20 months, and Psalm, four months, get baptised on Monday (also pictured with eldest daughter North, six)

Sensational: Mother-of-four Kim was suited and booted as she shrouded her famous curves in a cream two-piece, featuring a longline blazer and a strapless straight-leg jumpsuit

What a woman! With her raven tresses styled into effortless waves, Kim complemented her beauty with brown eyeshadow, matte foundation and classic nude lipstick for the perfect pout

Wow-factor! The reality star is said to boast a net worth of $370 million, and most recently, launched her shapewear line, SKIMS, which reportedly made $2 million within minutes

The convention sees the world’s leading academics, technologists and entrepreneurs host sessions on technological advancements, as well as artificial intelligence, virtual reality, cybersecurity and climate change. This year's event follows the theme The Power of Decentralization: Promise and Peril.

WCIT aims to explore the positive and negative impact of information and communication technology on profits and prosperity, safety and security, democracy and humanity.

Kim rose to fame as a reality star on E!'s Keeping Up With The Kardashians in 2007, but has since transformed into a savvy businesswoman - with a series of successful make-up, clothing and perfume lines under her belt.

Standing tall: Maintaining her stylish display, the pop culture icon strutted into the venue in a pair of white pointed heels as she was met by eager fans

Beaming: Kim beamed from ear-to-ear as she hit the stage to discuss her thriving businesses

Centre stage: An image of the Los Angeles native was displayed on a monitor as she shook hands with the host

Impressive: She rose to fame as a reality star on E!'s Keeping Up With The Kardashians in 2007, but has since transformed into a businesswoman

Incredible: The Deep In The Valley star has a series of successful make-up, clothing and perfume lines under her belt

Important topic: This year's WCIT event follows the theme The Power of Decentralization: Promise and Peril

The media personality is said to boast a net worth of $370 million. Most recently, the brunette beauty launched her shapewear line, SKIMS, which reportedly made $2 million in minutes, according to TMZ.

The Vogue coverstar recently hinted she's planning to produce SKIMS in Armenia. The Armenian National Committee of America tweeted at the time: 'Thank you @KimKardashian for considering #Armenia as a future site for @skims production!

'We look forward to your upcoming trip to Armenia, value all you do to share our heritage, and love and respect your family's passion for #Armenian #Genocide recognition.'

Making power moves: The convention aims to explore the positive and negative impact of information and communication technology

Cheery: The social media sensation beamed with delight as she waved at the crowd

Legions of fans: She captivated the audience with her discussion at the technology event

Excited: Feeling giddy about her trip, the entrepreneur tweeted: 'Almost 3 am in Armenia and I can’t sleep I’m so excited to be here and see everyone!'

'I have big plans': Kim recently revealed her plans to produce her shapewear range in Armenia last month

She replied: 'Thank you! I’ve been working extremely hard on this matter and hope my trip to Armenia will bring some amazing news because I have big plans!'

Earlier in the week, Kim was joined by sister Kourtney, 40, and her children Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and Reign, four, as they witnessed her kids get baptised.

In April 2015, the make-up mogul and her husband Kanye West, 42, baptised their eldest daughter North, six, into the Armenian Apostolic Church in Jerusalem, which was held at a 12th Century church within the walls of the Old City.

A baptism or christening serves as a symbol of purification and admission to the Christian Church. In Armenian culture, those being baptised traditionally wear white.

Tender moments: In April 2015, the make-up mogul and her husband Kanye West, 42, baptised their eldest daughter North into the Armenian Apostolic Church in Jerusalem (pictured)

Feeling giddy about her trip, Kim - whose family fled the country and relocated to in the early 20th century - tweeted: 'Almost 3 am in Armenia and I can’t sleep I’m so excited to be here and see everyone!'

She first visited Armenia with sister Khloe, 35, mother Kris Jenner, 63, husband Kanye and their daughter North in 2015.

During their visit, the reality stars laid red tulips at the memorial commemorating the victims of the Armenian genocide 100 years ago.

The group visited the eternal flame of the Armenian Genocide Memorial Complex on the outskirts of Yerevan as part of an eight-day tour of the country.
description: The KUWTK star, 38, attended the World Congress on Information Technology (WCIT) convention at the Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concert Complex in Yerevan on Tuesday.
